nodes.text: Jabba's Palace garage, also referred to as the sail barge hangar, was a hangar located underneath Jabba's Palace on the desert planet of Tatooine. The garage held Jabba's luxury sail barge, the modified LO-KD57 Khetanna, as well as a number of Bantha-II cargo skiffs.

The sail barge hangar was located underneath Jabba's Palace. Its primary access to the outside was a large hangar door, just outside of which were numerous junk piles made up of scrap metal. The floor of the garage itself was made of polished stone, and on the ceiling was a ventilator. In addition to housing the Khetanna, the garage was the location of numerous workshops and animal pens.

At some point after acquiring the former B'omarr monastery from the bandit Alkhara and transforming it into his palace, Jabba hired architect Derren Flet to modify the palace to suit his needs. This included the construction of the hangar to house Jabba's luxury sail barge Khetanna, which Flet had commissioned from Ubrikkian Industries. Flet met his end when designing the palace dungeons, as he was executed by the Hutt for failing to deliver adequate holding for Jabba's many prisoners.
